WorkItem.Description: it seems that the 3% crit dmg bonus of meta gems is not taken into account. Rawr value the Destructive Skyflare Diamond better ^^
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] 3% crit dmg of RED and CSD Meta

Comments.Message:
What model (class/spec) are you using?  What character/server/region?  The Destructive Skyflare is better than... what?

Please be a little less cryptic/more informative, so we can actually help.
My apologies, you did sorta-kinda include some of that information in the title.  The rest of the query for more info still stands.

well, sorry to have been cryptic.
On the DPSDK module, for every character, even a naked one (i'm Arrouz/kirin tor/EU) the 2 meta gem with a 3% critique damage bonus ( the Chaotic Skyflare Diamond : +21 Critical Strike Rating and 3% Increased Critical Damage and the Relentless Earthsiege Diamond : +21 Agility and 3% Increased Critical Damage) are not valued correctly. the 3% crit dmg bonus is not used.
To test it, edit the gem and replace the 3% by 3000% (both % crit dmg and % spell crit dmg) and see the value stay the same.
the Impassive Skyflare Diamond : +21 Critical Strike Rating and Fear Duration Reduced by 10%, and Beaming Earthsiege Diamond : +21 Critical Strike Rating and +2% Mana, have the same rating than the Chaotic Skyflare Diamond.
